name: relay-starter-kit
description: A quick way to get up and running with Relay

scripts.start: npm run start-graphql & npm run start-node
scripts.update-schema: source server/env/bin/activate && cd server && python scripts/update_schema.py
scripts.start-graphql: source server/env/bin/activate && cd server && python app.py
scripts.install-python-deps: virtualenv -p python3.5 server/env && source server/env/bin/activate && pip install -r server/requirements.txt
